CommandIds.description: An array of command IDs. If you include this parameter, DescribeCommands returns a description of the specified commands. Otherwise, it returns a description of every command.

DeploymentId.description: The deployment ID. If you include this parameter, DescribeCommands returns a description of the commands associated with the specified deployment.

InstanceId.description: The instance ID. If you include this parameter, DescribeCommands returns a description of the commands associated with the specified instance.
